Dear Jury,

I've played this game with integrity and strategy, always aiming to foster meaningful conversations. I've been consistent in my approach and have respected the rules. My opponent, while strong, has been less predictable, which could have put their allies at risk. For a steadfast and reliable winner, choose me.

Your vote isn’t just for me—it’s for the game you believe in. Thank you."
